One action can hold even more meaning than you may think

"Lobo Mau" ("Bad Wolf" translating to english)  is a project that started as a portrait of how the daily life of a literal "lone wolf" would be and was initially planned to be a short story of 20 pages tops, but it was so well received that I ended up getting inspired to tell a more detailed and proper story, where in each chapter we discover a little more about the main character's story, fears and caracteristics. The main story doesn't contain speech bubbles at all, making the reader interpret it visually.

With a long yet light narrative, we are introduced bit by bit to the main character's life, and as the story progresses we see common, simple and yet relatable situations of our everyday life that may have a bigger impact in the future.

We count on your support to turn this project into a beautiful booklet!
